div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 684 Deva, Rumania, 1913 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: AR ("many thousands") Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Roman Rep.: den. Disposition: Deva some; V. Bude, Bucha- rest 14 (dr.) Bude, CNA 1925, p. 41 Floca, Sargetia 6 (1969), p. 21, and note 26
